name: After the Crash
description:
After the Crash is a puzzle game 3 in 1. Popular match 3 puzzle, no less popular 15 puzzle game and the game with microcircuits in the compartment with the plot of the main character make the game unique and interesting. Beautiful graphics and nice soundtrack will appeal to many players.

Kelly went in search of the missing sister. But she crashed and she had to land on the nearest planet. Help Kelly to repair the damaged ship in this colorful space game. You have to do the extraction of the necessary resources in a simple but very entertaining match-3 game, debug microcircuits comparing its elements and assembly modules in a 15-puzzle game.
